description: This file defines a class TelegramTools that provides methods to send messages via the Telegram Bot API, including initialization, message sending, and HTTP request handling.

classes.name: TelegramTools
classes.description: A class that provides methods to send messages to a Telegram chat using the Telegram Bot API.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the TelegramTools instance with chat ID and optional token, setting up the tools list.

methods.name: _call_post_method
methods.description: Handles HTTP POST requests to the Telegram API with the specified method and arguments.

methods.name: send_message
methods.description: Sends a message to the configured Telegram chat and returns the API response or error message.
